debates.showAs: Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed)
Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide administrative support for elected members of local authorities to assist in the performance of their duties; to amend the Local Government Act 2001; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do sholáthar tacaíocht riaracháin do chomhaltaí tofa d’údaráis áitiúla chun cúnamh a thabhairt maidir lena ndualgais a chomhlíonadh; do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Rialtais Áitiúil (Tacaíocht do Chomhaltaí Tofa), 2024

debates.showAs: National Minimum Wage (Adequate Wages for Living) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 to provide for implementation of Directive (EU) 2022/2041 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 October 2022 on adequate minimum wages in the European Union.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta, 2000 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le Treoir (AE) 2022/2041 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 19 Deireadh Fómhair 2022 maidir le pá íosta leordhóthanach san Aontas Eorpach a chur i ngníomh.
bill.shortTitleEn: National Minimum Wage (Adequate Wages for Living) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta (Pá Leordhóthanach chun Maireachtála), 2024

debates.showAs: Parole (Special Advocates) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Parole (Special Advocates) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Parole Act 2019 to provide for the appointment of special advocates to represent the interests of relevant applicants in certain cases before the Parole Board, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Parúil, 2019 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le haighní speisialta a cheapadh chun bheith ionadaitheach do leasanna iarratasóirí iomchuí i gcásanna áirithe atá os comhair an Bhoird Parúil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Parúil (Aighní Speisialta), 2024

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 2018 by means of extending the restrictions on those present in courtroom proceedings, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 trí na srianta a bheidh orthu siúd a bheidh i láthair in imeachtaí i seomra cúirte a leathnú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhoréigean Baile (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2024

debates.showAs: Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: Order for Committee Stage
Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for restrictions on the transit and export of weapons of war from and through the State to the state of Israel and to provide for appropriate inspections of planes seeking to transit weapons through the State, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le srianta ar thrasghluaiseacht agus onnmhairiú arm cogaidh as an Stát, agus tríd an Stát, chuig stát Iosrael agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiniúchtaí cuí ar eitleáin lena bhféachfar le hairm a thrasghluaiseacht tríd an Stát, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Aerloingseoireachta agus Aeriompair (Lánchosc Arm), 2024

debates.showAs: Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Report and Final Stages
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Committee Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Disability Act 2005 and the Equal Status Act 2000 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Míchumas (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2023

debates.showAs: Climate Action and Biodiversity (Mandates of Certain Organisations) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Climate Action and Biodiversity (Mandates of Certain Organisations) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Turf Development Act 1946 and the Forestry Act 1988 in order to reflect obligations regarding climate action and the protection and enhancement of biodiversity in the mandate and functions of the organisations established under those Acts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Forbartha Móna, 1946 agus an Achta Foraoiseachta, 1988 d’fhonn oibleagáidí, maidir le gníomhú ar son na haeráide agus maidir leis an mbithéagsúlacht a chosaint agus a fheabhsú, a léiriú i mandáid agus i bhfeidhmeanna na n-eagraíochtaí a bunaíodh faoi na hAchtanna sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Climate Action and Biodiversity (Mandates of Certain Organisations) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhú Aeráide agus um Bithéagsúlacht (Mandáidí Eagraíochtaí Áirithe), 2023

debates.showAs: Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Electoral (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Electoral (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electoral Reform Act 2022 to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of the electoral system and franchise for Seanad Éireann, and to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of voting age; to amend the Electoral Act 1997 to protect the right to freedom of association and expression for civil society organisations in Ireland, and to provide for free public transport on polling day; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Athchóiriú Toghcháin, 2022 chun socrú a dhéanamh i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an gcóras toghcháin agus ar an toghchóras do Sheanad Éireann, agus do dhéanamh socrú, i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an aois vótála; do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1997 chun an ceart chun saoirse comhlachais agus saoirse chun tuairimí a nochtadh a chosaint i gcomhair eagraíochtaí na sochaí sibhialta in Éirinn, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiompar poiblí saor in aisce ar an lá vótaíochta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú Toghcháin (Leasú) agus um Thoghchán (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electoral Reform Act 2022 to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of the electoral system and franchise for Seanad Éireann, and to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of voting age; to amend the Electoral Act 1997 to protect the right to freedom of association and expression for civil society organisations in Ireland, and to provide for free public transport on polling day; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Athchóiriú Toghcháin, 2022 chun socrú a dhéanamh i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an gcóras toghcháin agus ar an toghchóras do Sheanad Éireann, agus do dhéanamh socrú, i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an aois vótála; do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1997 chun an ceart chun saoirse comhlachais agus saoirse chun tuairimí a nochtadh a chosaint i gcomhair eagraíochtaí na sochaí sibhialta in Éirinn, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiompar poiblí saor in aisce ar an lá vótaíochta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú Toghcháin (Leasú) agus Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha, 2023

debates.showAs: Institutional Burials (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Institutional Burials Act 2022 to enable the Director of Authorised Intervention to engage in cases where precise burial places cannot be identified but where inappropriate burials are likely to have taken place in an institutional setting, to provide for cases where persons who consider that they are related to persons thought to be buried on principal burial land indicate that an excavation of the land is their preference, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Adhlacthaí Forais, 2022 chun a chumasú don Stiúrthóir um Idirghabháil Údaraithe gabháil do chásanna nach féidir áiteanna beachta adhlactha a chéannú ach inar dóigh gur tharla adhlacthaí míchuí i suíomh forais, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cásanna ina léiríonn daoine a mheasann go bhfuil siad gaolta le daoine a cheaptar a bheith adhlactha i bpríomhthalamh adhlactha gurb é a rogha é go ndéanfar an talamh a thochailt, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Adhlacthaí Forais (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: Report Stage
Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: Committee Stage
Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the title of the Child Trafficking and Pornography Act 1998 whereafter, following commencement of this Act, the Act of 1998 shall be titled the “Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Abuse Material Act 1998”(Amendment); to amend the title of the Child Trafficking and Pornography (Amendment) Act 2004 whereafter, following commencement of this Act, the Act of 2004 shall be titled the “Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Act 2004”; to substitute the term “Child Pornography” with “Child Sexual Exploitation Material” within those Acts and other Acts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú theideal an Achta um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Pornagrafaíocht Leanaí, 1998 chun gurb é teideal Acht 1998, tar éis thosach feidhme an Achta seo, “An tAcht um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Ábhar a bhaineann le Drochúsáid Ghnéasach Leanaí 1998”(Leasú); do leasú theideal an Achta um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Pornagrafaíocht Leanaí (Leasú), 2004 chun gurb é teideal Acht 2004, tar éis thosach feidhme an Achta seo, “An tAcht um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Ábhar a bhaineann le Teacht i dTír Gnéasach ar Leanaí (Leasú), 2004”; do chur an téarma “Ábhar a bhaineann le Teacht i dTír Gnéasach ar Leanaí” in ionad an téarma “Pornagrafaíocht Leanaí” sna hAchtanna sin agus in Achtanna eile.
bill.shortTitleEn: Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Ábhar a bhaineann le Teacht i dTír Gnéasach ar Leanaí (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: Second Stage
Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ban the importation of non-native honey bees with the aim of reducing the threat to and adverse impact upon biodiversity and the ecosystem arising from the introgression/crossing/cross-breeding of the native Irish Honey Bee, Apis mellifera mellifera, due to the importation of non-native species or sub-species of and/or strains derived from Apis mellifera and to provide for the appointment of authorised officers; to make it an offence to forge an animal health certificate; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur cosc le beacha nach beacha meala dúchasacha Éireannacha a allmhairiú, d’fhonn laghdú a dhéanamh ar an mbagairt, agus ar an drochthionchar, ar an mbithéagsúlacht agus ar an éiceachóras a eascraíonn as ionghabháil/crosáil/crosphórú na Beiche Meala dúchasaí Éireannaí, Apis mellifera mellifera, mar gheall ar allmhairiú speiceas neamhdhúchasach nó fospeiceas d’Apis mellifera agus/nó tréithchineálacha a dhíorthaíonn as Apis mellifera agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigigh údaraithe a cheapadh; do dhéanamh cion de dheimhniú um shláinte ainmhí a bhrionnú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an mBeach Mheala Dhúchasach Éireannach a Chosaint, 2021

debates.showAs: Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Second Stage
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to protect the free and unencumbered access to facilities providing legal termination of pregnancy services; protect individuals providing or facilitating legal termination of pregnancy services from harassment; and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun rochtain gan bhac gan chonstaic ar shaoráidí a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí foirceanta toirchis dlíthiúla a chosaint; chun daoine a sholáthraíonn nó a éascaíonn seirbhísí foirceanta toirchis dlíthiúla a chosaint ar chiapadh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rochtain Shábháilte ar Sheirbhísí Foirceanta Toirchis, 2021

debates.showAs: Companies (Emission Reporting) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Companies (Emission Reporting) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require companies to make annual public disclosures in relation to the greenhouse gas emissions caused by their activities, to cause decreases in such emissions over time, to amend the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 and the Companies Act 2014, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar chuideachtaí nochtaí poiblí bliantúla a dhéanamh i ndáil leis na hastaíochtaí gás ceaptha teasa arb iad a ngníomhaíochtaí is cúis leo, do chur faoi deara laghduithe a dhéanamh ar na hastaíochtaí sin le himeacht aimsire, do leasú an Achta um Ghníomhú Aeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbóin, 2015 agus Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na gCuideachtaí (Tuairisciú ar Astaíochtaí), 2021

debates.showAs: Land and Conveyancing Law Reform (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Land and Conveyancing Law Reform Act 2009 to provide for an amendment to section 38 of the same Act to extend the period for the registration of easements and profits à prendre.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Athchóiriú an Dlí Talún agus Tíolactha, 2009 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le leasú a dhéanamh ar alt 38 den Acht céanna chun an tréimhse chun éasúintí agus profits à prendre a chlárú a fhadú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Land and Conveyancing Law Reform (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú an Dlí Talún agus Tíolactha (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages [Private Members]
Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict the use of non-disclosure agreements as they relate to incidents of workplace sexual harassment and discrimination.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur srian le húsáid comhaontuithe neamhnochta mar a bhaineann siad le teagmhais ghnéaschiaptha agus idirdhealaithe san áit oibre.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Leasú) (Comhaontuithe Neamhnochta), 2021

debates.showAs: Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Order for Committee Stage
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give further effect to Directive 2014/24/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 and for that purpose to provide for contract award criteria in public contracts, to promote the use of social considerations and the best price-quality ratio and to establish a procedure for departing from best price-quality ratio, to ensure that section 3 of the European Convention on Human Rights Act 2003 applies to every contracting authority to which the said Directive relates in respect of a contract equal to or greater than a determinable monetary threshold, to provide for the issuing of guidelines concerning social considerations, to require annual reporting to each House of the Oireachtas concerning certain matters and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2014/24/AE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 26 Feabhra 2014 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le critéir dámhachtana conarthaí i gconarthaí poiblí, do chur úsáid cúinsí sóisialta agus an chóimheasa is fearr idir praghas agus cáilíocht chun cinn agus do bhunú nós imeachta le haghaidh imeacht ón gcóimheas is fearr idir praghas agus cáilíocht, dá chinntiú go mbeidh feidhm ag alt 3 den Acht fán gCoinbhinsiún Eorpach um Chearta an Duine, 2003 maidir le gach údarás conarthach lena mbaineann an Treoir sin i leith conradh atá comhionann le tairseach airgid inchinnte nó is mó ná sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le treoirlínte a bhaineann le cúinsí sóisialta a eisiúint, dá cheangal tuairisciú bliantúil a dhéanamh do gach Teach den Oireachtas maidir le nithe áirithe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cháilíocht i Sainfháil Phoiblí (Conarthaí a Ullmhú agus Critéir Dhámhachtana), 2021

debates.showAs: Deportation Moratorium (Covid-19) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Deportation Moratorium (Covid-19) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the deportation of persons from the State during the public health emergency posed by the spread of Covid-19 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc daoine a ionnarbadh as an Stát le linn na héigeandála sláinte poiblí de dheasca Covid-19 a bheith ag leathadh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Moratóir ar Ionnarbadh (Covid-19), 2020

debates.showAs: Seanad Bill 2020: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reform Seanad Éireann within the terms of the Constitution and for that purpose to expand the franchise at Seanad elections; to provide for the establishment of the Seanad Electoral Commission; to provide for the repeal of the Seanad Electoral (Panel Members) Act 1947 and the Seanad Electoral (University Members) Act 1937, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’athleasú Sheanad Éireann faoi réim théarmaí an Bhunreachta agus, chun na críche sin, do leathnú an toghchórais i gcás thoghcháin an tSeanaid; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gCoimisiún um Thoghcháin an tSeanaid a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hAcht Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Rolla-Chomhaltaí), 1947 agus Acht Toghacháin an tSeanaid (Baill Phríomh-Scoile), 1937 a aisghairm, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Seanad, 2020

debates.showAs: Community Participation (Disability) (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Community Participation (Disability) (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to promote better provision in respect of the use by persons with disabilities of certain buildings and other places and transport services and for that purpose, to amend the Local Government Act 2001, the Planning and Development Act 2001, the Public Transport Regulation Act 2009 and the Building Regulations 1997; to provide for the commencement of certain provisions of the Citizens Information Act 2007; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú feabhsaithe a chur chun cinn i leith úsáid foirgneamh áirithe agus áiteanna eile agus seirbhísí iompair ag daoine faoi mhíchumas agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001, an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2001, an Achta um Rialáil Iompair Phoiblí, 2009 agus na Rialachán Foirgníochta, 1997; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tosach feidhme forálacha áirithe den Acht um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh, 2007; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rannpháirtíocht Phobail (Míchumas) (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2019

debates.showAs: Electoral (Civil Society Freedom)(Amendment) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Electoral (Civil Society Freedom) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electoral Act 1997 to protect the right to freedom of association and expression for civil society organisations in Ireland and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1997 chun an ceart chun saoirse comhlachais agus saoirse chun tuairimí a nochtadh a chosaint i gcomhair eagraíochtaí na sochaí sibhialta in Éirinn agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Toghcháin (Saoirse na Sochaí Sibhialta) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Public Authorities and Utility Undertakings (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Public Authorities and Utility Undertakings (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give further effect to Directive 2014/24/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 and to Directive 2014/25/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 and for those purposes to provide for contract award criteria in public contracts, to promote the use of social considerations and the best price-quality ratio and to establish a procedure for departing from best price-quality ratio, to ensure that section 3 of the European Convention on Human Rights Act 2003 applies to persons carrying out functions for or on behalf of organs of State, to provide for the issuing of guidelines concerning social considerations, to require annual reporting to each House of the Oireachtas concerning certain matters and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2014/24/AE an 26 Feabhra 2014 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle agus do Threoir 2014/25/AE an 26 Feabhra 2014 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le critéir dámhachtana conarthaí i gconarthaí poiblí, do chur úsáid cúinsí sóisialta agus an chóimheasa is fearr maidir le praghas-cáilíocht chun cinn agus do bhunú nós imeachta chun imeacht ón gcóimheas is fearr maidir le praghas-cáilíocht, dá áirithiú go mbeidh feidhm ag alt 3 den Acht fán gCoinbhinsiún Eorpach um Chearta an Duine, 2003 maidir le daoine a bheidh ag comhall feidhmeanna d’orgain Stáit nó thar a gceann, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le treoirlínte a bhaineann le cúinsí sóisialta a eisiúint, dá cheangal tuairisciú bliantúil a dhéanamh do gach Teach den Oireachtas maidir le nithe áirithe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Public Authorities and Utility Undertakings (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údaráis Phoiblí agus Gnóthais Fóntais (Conarthaí a Ullmhú agus Critéir Dhámhachtana), 2019

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: Second Stage
Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit conversion therapy, as a deceptive and harmful act or practice against a person's sexual orientation, gender identity and, or gender expression.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc teiripe thiontúcháin mar ghníomh nó cleachtas meabhlach agus dochrach in aghaidh gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht inscne agus/nó léiriú inscne duine.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Theiripí Tiontúcháin, 2018

debates.showAs: Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018 [Seanad]: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018 [Seanad]: Second Stage [Private Members]
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Report and Final Stages
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Committee Stage (Resumed)
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed)
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed)
Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give effect to the State's obligations arising under the Fourth Geneva Convention relative to the Protection of Civilian Persons in Time of War and under customary international humanitarian law; and for that purpose to make it an offence for a person to import or sell goods or services originating in an occupied territory or to extract resources from an occupied territory in certain circumstances; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt éifeacht d'oibleagáidí an Stáit a eascraíonn faoi Choinbhinsiún na Ginéive maidir le Cosaint Daoine Sibhialta in Aimsir Chogaidh, ar a dtugtar an Ceathrú Coinbhinsiún de chuid na Ginéive, agus faoin dlí daonchairdiúil idirnáisiúnta gnách; agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh cion de dhuine d'allmhairiú nó do dhíol earraí nó seirbhísí ar de bhunadh críoch faoi fhorghabháil iad, nó acmhainní a asbhaint as críoch faoi fhorghabháil in imthosca áirithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Control of Economic Activity (Occupied Territories) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhaíocht Eacnamaíoch a Rialú (Críocha faoi Fhorghabháil), 2018

debates.showAs: International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Referral to Select Committee
International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Second Stage [Private Members]

International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Committee Stage

International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)
International Protection (Family Reunification) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a refugee or a person eligible for subsidiary protection to apply for members of their family, including a grandparent, parent, brother, sister, child, grandchild, ward or guardian, to enter and reside in the State
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le dídeanaí nó duine atá incháilithe le haghaidh cosaint fhoghabhálach do dhéanamh iarratais ar dhaoine dá theaghlach nó dá teaghlach, lena n-áirítear seanathair nó seanmháthair, tuismitheoir, deartháir, deirfiúr, leanbh, ua nó banua, coimircí nó caomhnóir, do theacht isteach sa Stát agus do chónaí sa Stát
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Idirnáisiúnta (Athaontú Teaghlaigh) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Order for Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Misuse of Drugs Acts 1977-2016 to provide for the decriminalisation for possession of controlled drugs for personal use and to provide for regulations regarding personal use; to establish a Drug Dissuasion Service to case-manage persons found in possession of controlled drugs and to divert people away from the courts by providing a system of harm reduction measures including drug awareness, drug rehabilitation and community engagement programmes; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 go 2016 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le díchoiriúlú a dhéanamh ar shealbhú drugaí rialaithe chun úsáide pearsanta agus chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le rialacháin a bhaineann le húsáid phearsanta; do bhunú Seirbhís Athchomhairliúcháin Drugaí chun daoine a bhfaightear drugaí rialaithe ina seilbh a chásbhainistiú agus chun daoine a athstiúradh ó na cúirteanna trí chóras de bhearta laghdaithe dochair a sholáthar, lena n-áirítear feasacht i leith drugaí, athshlánúchán ó dhrugaí agus cláir rannpháirtíochta pobail; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhrugaí Rialaithe agus um Dhochar a Laghdú, 2017

debates.showAs: Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: Restoration to Order Paper
Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: Second Stage
Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: for the purposes of making further and better provision for the care and protection of adults who are at risk; to establish the National Adult Safeguarding Authority; to require certain persons to make reports to the National Adult Safeguarding Authority in respect of adults at risk of abuse or harm in certain circumstances; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun socrú breise agus feabhsaithe a dhéanamh chun cúram agus cosaint a thabhairt d'aosaigh atá i mbaol; chun an t-Údarás Náisiúnta um Chosaint Aosach a bhunú; dá cheangal ar dhaoine áirithe tuarascálacha a thabhairt don Údarás Náisiúnta um Chosaint Aosach maidir le haosaigh atá i mbaol drochúsáide nó dochair in imthosca áirithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aosaigh a Chosaint, 2017

debates.showAs: Derelict and Vacant Sites Bill 2017: Second Stage
Derelict and Vacant Sites Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Derelict Sites Act 1990 to increase the levy placed on derelict sites; to ensure the register of derelict sites compiled by a local authority is made publicly available on the local authority's website; to ensure protection for the rights of older homeowners who have moved into residential care and own a derelict site; to amend the Urban Regeneration and Housing Act 2015 to extend the definition of a "vacant site" to include sites below 0.05 hectares; to bring into operation the entering of vacant sites on local authority registers starting June 2017; to ensure the notification of owners of vacant sites of their entry on the register by 2017; to secure payment of the vacant levy by those on the register from 2017 and payment of arrears no later than 2018; to increase the vacant site levy; to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 to secure the rights of tenants in buy-to-let properties; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Láithreáin Thréigthe, 1990 chun an tobhach a chuirtear ar láithreáin thréigthe a mhéadú; dá áirithiú go ndéanfar clár na láithreán tréigthe arna thiomsú ag údarás áitiúil a chur ar fáil go poiblí ar shuíomh gréasáin an údaráis áitiúil; dá áirithiú go gcosnófar cearta úinéirí teaghaise scothaosta atá tar éis aistriú go dtí cúram cónaithe agus a bhfuil láithreán tréigthe ar úinéireacht acu; do leasú an Achta um Athbheochan Uirbeach agus Tithe, 2015 chun an míniú ar "láithreán tréigthe" a leathnú chun go bhfolófar ann láithreáin faoi bhun 0.05 heicteár; dá thabhairt i ngníomh láithreáin fholmha a iontráil ar chláir údaráis áitiúil, ag tosú i Meitheamh 2017; dá áirithiú go dtabharfar fógra d'úinéirí láithreán folamh á rá go n-iontrálfar iad ar an gclár faoi 2017; dá áirithiú go n-íocfaidh na húinéirí sin atá ar an gclár an tobhach folamh ó 2017 agus go n-íocfar riaráistí tráth nach déanaí ná 2018; do mhéadú an tobhaigh láithreáin fholaimh; do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 chun cearta tionóntaí atá i maoine ceannach lena ligean a áirithiú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Láithreáin Thréigthe agus Láithreáin Fholmha, 2017

debates.showAs: Seanad Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed)
Seanad Bill 2016: Second Stage
Seanad Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to implement reforms proposed in the Report of the Working Group on Seanad Reform and for that purpose to effect a range of reforms to the Seanad, to provide for the establishment of a Seanad Electoral Commission and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun athchóirithe a mholtar sa Tuarascáil ón nGasra Oibre um Athchóiriú an tSeanaid a chur i ngníomh agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh réimse athchóirithe ar an Seanad, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Coimisiún um Thoghcháin an tSeanaid a bhunú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Seanad, 2016
